Welcome to the Jensen Lab

Our team of engineers and scientists tackle infectious diseases. We use robotics, genomics, and computation to accelerate microbiology and design new therapies.


Join the Jensen Lab!

We are recruiting graduate students (M.S. and Ph.D.) for Fall 2021 in the following areas:
  • Deep Reinforcement Learning
  • Automated/Combinatorial Science
  • High-throughput Genomic Technologies
Students with backgrounds in engineering, computer science, and microbiology can join our multi-disciplinary team as we tackle big questions about the oral microbiome. Check out our research or state-of-the-art automation system.

How to apply:

We accept students through the following graduate programs:
  • Bioengineering
  • Microbiology
  • Informatics
Both M.S. and Ph.D. students receive financial support as research assistants (RAs). Our work is funded by the NIGMS, NIBIB, NSF, and Sandia National Lab.
